name: ETCONME
description:
A Unique Blend of The Incredible and The Humble
UAE is dotted with service providers that worked as per client specs and delivered stated objectives. However when it came to adding value beyond client needs, very few were able to do so. ETCON ME was set up in 2010 to bridge this gap of value addition beyond the obvious to our customers.

locations.address: Suite # 520, Bin Sulaiman Center, Prince Sultan Street, Al Khaladiya
